thanks @TomAugspurger 

may want to think about someway of augmenting our is_scalar check that works on EA's.

> may want to think about someway of augmenting our is_scalar check that works on EA's

I am not sure that will be possible (or desirable), because in principle such scalars can be anything, including lists and dicts
